document_data.name: Adrian Carrathal
document_data.mainbody: '''Adrian "the Twinblade" Carrathal''' was High King of [[Callidyrr]] from the midâ€“12{{th}} through the turn of the 13{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite dragon/362/Grand History of the Realms: The Moonshaes|33}} Like his predecessors, although he held the title of High King of the [[Moonshae Isles]], he was considered to be merely a figurehead by the [[Ffolk]] outside of Callidyrr.
document_data.Relationships: He was a member of the [[Carrathal Dynasty]]. He was the sole heir of [[Edwin Carrathal II|King Edwin II]] and [[Eleanor Carrathal|Queen Eleanor]], and his eventual successor was his grandson, [[Cedric Carrathal|Cedric]].
